channel.title: Error with compiler

item.title: Error with compiler
item.dc:creator: @shank_beast shank beast
item.description:
@shank_beast wrote:

100 errors almost always mean that it’s a bracket problem. Check and see if there is a missing bracket. lol

Read full topic

item.title: Error with compiler
item.dc:creator: @The7thSanctum The7thSanctum
item.description:
@The7thSanctum wrote:

You’re missing a ‘}’. Look where you last coded in that file.

Read full topic
